WRITING.TEXT: I've had it since a week after the phone was launched and it has lived in a case and the screen protector it came with. The protector has scratches but the phone looks as good as new. Even after 9 months, still one of the best phones in the market. :)
imo this should have more upvotes than Audioslave - Like a Stone.
His distribution is great. He's another Eric Dier in the making and will make a solid CDM. At Defence, quite literally everytime I've watched him start, He has been the cause of a goal or two.
I dont think CCV should be in the starting lineup anytime soon. Shambles! His penalty giveaway was as bad as Slippy G going to the ground.
I'd suggest if you can hold on for a few more months. Then wait for OP4! That would be worth the upgrade for sure!

WRITING.TITLE: Devin Townsend Project - Supercrush [Metal] I feel he's underappreciated. Love his vocals.
Are Shops open in T-Nagar tomorrow?
WRITING.TEXT: My parents are coming from hyd for a couple of days and wanted to go shopping in T-Naagar. Does anyone have any idea about the shops being open tomorrow? Its been declared as statewide holiday tomorrow.

try changing the settings to update apps automatically over wifi. My apps got updated after that. I think when the ping is high it is taking nearly forever to download an app. I was unable to download any new app until now. When I have better internet and low ping.

While messaging through quick reply, If the same person messages again, The text I was writing disappears and just the new message shows up. So I have to type the message all over again and hope the person doesn't message again in the meantime.
